# Multitenant login

<MultitenancyIntro />

<CreateConfigureTenants />

## Step 2: Frontent setup

To fetch the login methods dynamically from the backend, use the following API:

```tsx

import SuperTokens from 'supertokens-web-js';

const loginMethods = await SuperTokens.getLoginMethods({
  tenantId: '...'
})

if (loginMethods.thirdParty.enabled) {
  const providers = loginMethods.thirdParty.providers;
  // render the login buttons
} else {
  // thirdparty login is disabled for the tenant
}
```

## Step 3: Backend setup

Remove the `providers` list from the `thirdparty` config. The backend SDK will automatically pick up the configuration stored in the core.

<BackendSDKTabs>

```go
import (
	"github.com/supertokens/supertokens-golang/recipe/thirdparty"
)

func main() {
	// Inside supertokens.Init
  // highlight-start
	thirdparty.Init(nil)
		// highlight-end
}
```
